intro: Psychotria rigida, commonly known as the rigid psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America, particularly in the understory of humid forests. The plant is characterized by its dark green, elliptical leaves and small, clustered white flowers. It produces small, red berries that are edible but have a mild stimulant effect. Psychotria rigida is often found in shaded, moist environments and is part of the diverse flora in neotropical ecosystems.
